typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ColonyID as short,
		ColonyName as string,
		Latitude as double,
		Longitude as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	purgeFiles: true,
	wildcardPaths:['colony*']) ~> source1
source1 alterRow(upsertIf(true()),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		ColonyID as integer,
		ColonyName as string,
		Lat as double,
		Long as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['ColonyID'],
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['SET IDENTITY_INSERT [dbo].[Colony] ON'],
	postSQLs:['SET IDENTITY_INSERT [dbo].[Colony] OFF'],
	mapColumn(
		ColonyID,
		ColonyName,
		Lat = Latitude,
		Long = Longitude
	)) ~> sink1
